name: Easy D&D Map Maker
description: Snap, stretch, and rotate objects into anything you can imagine in this 100% FREE tool! Easy D&D Map Maker makes it easy to create effective maps for Dungeons and Dragons, or any table-top game. Your map can be exported to a PNG image at an aspect ratio that's perfect for printing, or saved then loaded for further editing. The interface is incredibly simple and easy to use. No cost, no install, just download this small file and launch it to start creating!
